info.name: Storage Management API
info.description:
Postman collection for Storage Management API.

**Phase 1 Endpoints:**
- Health check endpoint
- Server connectivity tests

**Phase 2 Endpoints:**
- User Registration
- User Login
- User Logout

**Phase 3 Endpoints:**
- Update Profile
- Change Password
- Forgot/Reset Password

**Phase 4 Endpoints:**
- Initiate Google OAuth
- Google OAuth Callback

**Phase 5 Endpoints:**
- Upload File
- List Files
- Get File Details
- Download File
